longBusinessSummary: National Bank of Kuwait S.A.K.P., together with its subsidiaries, provides financial and investment services and solutions to individual, corporate, and institutional clients in Kuwait, the Middle East, North Africa, Europe, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through six segments: Consumer Banking, Corporate Banking, NBK Health, Islamic Banking, Group Center, and International Banking. It offers consumer loans, credit cards, trade finance, deposits, foreign exchange and advisory, and other related services. The company also provides wealth management, lending, custody, and brokerage services. In addition, it offers Islamic banking products and services; investment products; and treasury services and products. The company was incorporated in 1952 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
